name: Denorex Extra Strength Multi-Symptom Anti Dandruff Shampoo & Conditioner Treatment, 3% Salicylic Acid Helps Relieve Moderate Symptoms of Dandruff, Seborrheic Dermatitis & Psoriasis, 10oz
short_description: Multi-Symptom Anti-Dandruff Treatment | Medicated 3% salicylic acid formula fights flakes, buildup, scaling, itching, irritation, and dryness caused by dandruff, seborrheic dermatitis, and psoriasis
The Tingle Tells You It's Working | Cooling agents deliver instant, soothing comfort for scalp relief that you can feel
Hydrating 2-in-1 Formula | Cleanses and conditions in one easy step for softer, healthier-looking hair - no dryness or stripping
Extra Strength, Dermatologist-Approved | Trusted for over 40 years, Denorex provides clinical-strength relief without a prescription
Gentle Yet Effective Care: Free from SLS, SLES, and parabens for powerful symptom control that’s safe for everyday use

Clinically Tested & Proven Results | In a consumer panel study of 600+ participants, 88% reported improvement in scalp symptoms after just one use, and 96% loved the cooling, tingling sensation that signals relief
product_description: "Extra Strength Denorex dandruff shampoo and conditioner helps relieve moderate symptoms of dandruff seborrheic dermatitis and psoriasis. Formulated with 3% salicylic acid Extra Strength Denorex works to prevent the recurrence of these symptoms. name: Head & Shoulders Supreme Anti-Dandruff Shampoo and Conditioner Set, 1% Pyrithione Zinc, Sulfate-Free, Argan Oil and Rose Essence, for Dry Scalp and Dandruff, 21.2 fl oz
short_description: Clinically Proven. Up to 100% Dandruff Protection*. (*visible flakes, with regular use)
Head & Shoulders Soothe & Strengthen Shampoo and Conditioner control frizz for up to 24 hours
From the #1 dermatologist recommended brand
Soothe & Strengthen Shampoo and Conditioner have the vibrant scent of fresh fruit and elegant florals

PARABEN FREE: Head & Shoulders Soothe & Strengthen Daily Shampoo and Conditioner are paraben free
product_description: Looking for a shampoo and conditioner that leave your hair smooth and up to 100% flake-free*? Look no further than Head & Shoulders Soothe & Strengthen Shampoo and Conditioner. With rich and creamy lather, Head & Shoulders Soothe & Strengthen Shampoo nourishes hair with intense moisture and leaves hair sleek, shining and free of frizz for 24 hours. Plus, Head & Shoulders is the number one anti-dandruff shampoo recommended by dermatologists so you know your hair will be up to 100% flake-free.* *visible flakes; with regular use Regular use of Head & Shoulders anti dandruff products nourish your scalp three surface layers deep to prevent dryness, flakes and itch, associated with dandruff. The Head & Shoulders collection includes clarifying shampoos, volumizing conditioners, and 2 in 1 combos, so you can introduce dandruff treatment to every step of your hair care routine. With a pH-balanced formula brought to you by America's #1 dermatologist recommended brand, you can count on Head & Shoulders to combat seborrheic dermatitis, and other irritable and itchy scalp conditions associated with dandruff. Head & Shoulders products come in a variety of scents and formulas, and include ingredients like almond oil, tea tree oil, lemon extract, and peppermint. The shampoo & conditioner system are safe to use on color treated, curly or textured hair types, compared to a non-conditioning shampoo.

name: 24HR Fast Itch Relief Anti-Fungal Shampoo for Psoriasis, Seborrheic Dermatitis & Folliculitis, Relieves Itchy, Dry Scalp, Sulfate & Paraben Free Anti-Dandruff Shampoo for Men and Women, 8.4 fl oz
short_description: Physician Formula: Our antifungal shampoo is specially formulated to provide rapid relief from the itching, burning, flaking, peeling, redness and scalp irritation caused by psoriasis, folliculitis, seborrheic dermatitis, eczema and psoriasis scalp treatments.

Herbal Enriched Ingredients: Our antifungal scalp shampoo uses a variety of natural ingredients, including Sophora flavescens root extract, Angelica acutiloba root extract, Platycladus orientalis leaf extract, etc. These ingredients not only have antibacterial, anti-inflammatory and scalp soothing effects, but also help to effectively treat fungi, maintain a healthy oil balance on the scalp, and promote scalp health.

Powerful Anti-itching and Anti-dandruff: If you are currently undergoing itchy scalp treatment and are bothered by persistent scalp itching, you may wish to try our dandruff shampoo and itchy scalp shampoo, which can help you effectively reduce dandruff and solve your problems such as folliculitis, dandruff, itchy scalp and dry scalp.

Relieve Scalp Discomfort: Our Itchy Scalp Shampoo & Seborrheic Dermatitis Shampoo & Folliculitis Shampoo is designed to relieve the discomfort of an itchy and irritated scalp at the root, providing long-lasting relief and comfort, as well as scalp treatment and itchy scalp treatment.

Suitable for Daily Use: Our Anti-Dandruff and Anti-fungal Shampoo is suitable for all types of permed hair or dyed hair. It is gentle and caring for sensitive scalp and suitable as a daily shampoo. Use our shampoo for 2-3 weeks, you will love our shampoo!Pro tip: Pair with our conditioner for amplified hair care results.

Selsun Blue Medicated Shampoo also contains cooling menthol and a quick-lather formula to intensively moisturize and clean your hair while providing soothing relief for your scalp. *Formulated without formaldehyde donors, lilial and residual MEA **Flake and itch associated with dandruff

name: OUAI Anti Dandruff Shampoo - Soothing Salicylic Acid Shampoo for Flaky, Dry and Itchy Scalp - Reduces Itching, Redness and Irritation - Sulfate Free Scalp Care (10 Fl Oz)
short_description: Stop Flaking on Your Plans - Ready for a healthier scalp? This anti-dandruff shampoo is formulated with Salicylic Acid to fight flakes and propanediol caprylate to provide soothing relief for irritated and dry scalp.

Clinically Proven to Fight Flakes & Soothe Scalps - 100% of participants using our shampoo for dandruff agreed: Less flaking, less itching, less irritation.* *According to a clinical study of 25 participants after 28 days of use.

OUAI Means Yes - In that casual Parisian way. OUAI is about being better IRL. It's about having honest conversations with our community. It's about letting go of unrealistic expectations and embracing your imperfections.

Made For Effortless Routines - All OUAI hair care products including this sulfate-free shampoo are carefully crafted to cut styling time and nourish your hair health. We put the good stuff in and leave the bad stuff out, without ever sacrificing quality.

Live Life Your OUAI - OUAI offers luxury hair products at affordable prices that are user-friendly — no glam squad needed. Wet your hair, lather up with our hydrating shampoo, leave on for 5 minutes, and rinse clean. Follow up with your favorite OUAI conditioner for clean, smooth hair.
